params.usr: Account to give CDP permissions to

params.collateralType: Collateral type the CDP has locked inside
params.deltaCollateral: Amount of collateral taken/added into the CDP
params.deltaDebt: Amount of debt taken/added into the CDP

params.coinDestination: Usually CoinSavingsAccount who passes the new coins to depositors
params.debtDestination: Usually AccountingEngine that can settle decreaseSoldAmount with surplus
params.rad: Amount of debt to create (expressed as a number with 45 decimals)

params.usr: Account to give CDP permissions to

params.collateralType: - collateral type we want to modify (collateralTypes[collateralType])
params.what: - name of variable in struct we want to change
- name of variable we want to change

params.collateralSource: Account we take collateral from/put collateral into
params.collateralType: Type of collateral to withdraw/deposit in and from the CDP
params.debtDestination: Account from which we credit/debit coins and debt
params.deltaCollateral: Amount of collateral added/extract from the CDP

params.rad: Amount of debt & coins to destroy (expressed as a number with 45 decimals)

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

params.deltaCollateral: Amount of collateral to take/add into src and give/take from dst
params.deltaDebt: Amount of debt to take/add into src and give/take from dst

params.accumulatedRate: Multiplier applied to the debtAmount in order to calculate the surplus
params.collateralType: Collateral type we accrue interest for
params.surplusDst: Destination for amount of surplus created by applying the interest rate to debt created by CDPs with 'collateralType'

params.collateralType: - safetyPrice's collateral type we want to update

approveSAFEModification(address).notice: Allow an address to modify your CDP. For example coinAdapter should be able to modify your CDP to withdraw all correctly.

collateralTypes(bytes32).notice: Total User Debt (drawn StablePro + stability fee accrued) = SAFE.generatedDebt * CollateralType.accumulatedRate

confiscateSAFECollateralAndDebt(bytes32,.notice: Normally used by the LiquidationEngine in order to confiscate collateral and debt from a CDP and give them to someone else

createUnbackedDebt(address,address,uint2.notice: Usually called by CoinSavingsAccount in order to create unbacked debt

denySAFEModification(address).notice: Deny an address the rights to modify your CDP

modifyParameters(bytes32,bytes32,uint256.notice: Method to modify values in struct of collateralTypes

modifyParameters(bytes32,uint256).notice: Method to modify some global variables

modifySAFECollateralization(bytes32,addr.notice: Add/remove collateral or put back/generate more debt in a CDP

settleDebt(uint256).notice: Nullify an amount of coins with an equal amount of debt

transferSAFECollateralAndDebt(bytes32,ad.notice: Transfer collateral and/or debt between CDPs

updateAccumulatedRate(bytes32,address,in.notice: Usually called by TaxCollector in order to accrue interest on a specific collateral type

updateSafetyPrice(bytes32).notice: Method to update safetyPrice, it's called each time, when function need actual safetyPrice
